waiver.title: Deferred pre-actuation budget enforcement
waiver.description:
Permits production constructors to wire BudgetTracker::deferred()
for pre-actuation budget checks. Pre-actuation receipts report
budget_checked=false with budget_enforcement_deferred=true.
The replay verifier accepts this tuple as valid in Phase 1.

Real per-session budget limits require episode budget allocation
(TCK-00346), which depends on authoritative budget sources not
yet available. This waiver expires automatically and MUST be
renewed or replaced by concrete budget tracking wiring.
conditions: budget_enforcement_deferred=true MUST be bound in receipt
Replay verifier MUST validate deferred flag consistency
Must be renewed or replaced before expiry
